<Text: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
1:

Text: The Exorcism of Emily Rose:  The film is loosely based on the story of Anneliese Michel and follows a self-proclaimed agnostic who acts as defense counsel (Linney) representing a parish priest (Wilkinson), accused by the state of negligent homicide after he performed an exorcism.
